mapper.select:
SELECT t_resort.*, t_user.name as user_name, t_user.icon, t_resort_image.resort_id, t_resort_image.image_url
FROM t_resort left join t_user on t_user.id = t_resort.user_id left join t_resort_image on t_resort_image.resort_id = t_resort.id
WHERE
6378.138 * 2 * ASIN(SQRT(POW(SIN((#{0} * PI()/180 - t_resort.`longitude` * PI()/180)/2),2) + COS(#{1} * PI()/180) * COS(t_resort.`latitude` * PI()/180) * POW(SIN((#{1} * PI()/180 - t_resort.`latitude` * PI()/180)/2),2))) < #{2}

select t_resort.* , t_user.name as user_name, 20 as type, t_user.icon, t_resort_image.id as resort_image_id, t_resort_image.image_url, t_resort_image.is_valid as image_is_valid from t_resort left join t_user on t_user.id=t_resort.user_id left join t_resort_image on t_resort.id=t_resort_image.resort_id
where t_resort.id=#{0}

SELECT t_comment.user_id as t_comment_user_id, t_comment.campsite_id as t_comment_campsite_id, t_comment.comment as t_comment_comment, t_comment.type as t_comment_type, t_comment.status as t_comment_status, t_comment.updated_at as t_comment_update_at, t_user.name AS user_name, t_user.icon FROM t_comment LEFT JOIN t_user ON t_comment.user_id=t_user.id WHERE t_comment.campsite_id=#{0} AND t_comment.type=#{1}
